The movie is compatible with XBOX360/PS3(except cinavia)/Apple/whatever.
On PC i suggest using MediaPlayerClassic-HC*** or PowerDVD 13. 
These are the players with the best decoding quality, VLC plays any kind of file you throw at it, but you'll get more decoding artifacts. For the best quality in VLC with HD material:
preferences/show--settings:all/video/filters/disable all filters, especially post-processing filter.

***in MPC-HC options be sure to select atleast Enhanced Video Renderer or Video Mixing renderer 9. 
--in options/playback/output/DirectShow Video


***********************************************************************************
***********************************************************************************

To enjoy AC3 Dolby digital 5.1 you need to select the 2nd audio track in your player of choice, be sure to have your playback device set on 5.1 output, and connected to your receiver via optical cable.

***********************************************************************************
***********************************************************************************


FLiCKSiCK releases have the goal to keep a good balance between video and audio quality at the smallest file size possible. There are already other teams delivering such deal, but to me they stress too much the filesize at the cost of quality, especially audio quality, so there we go. Enjoy.
